attributes.action: revise existing sentences on knife and gun crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Existing laws concerning knife and gun crime no longer act as a suitable deterrent. As a society we have allowed a culture to develop in which individuals treat existing laws with contempt. 

New legislation is required.  Anyone found guilty of carrying a knife with intent to use as a weapon should receive a minimal custodial sentence of 7 years without parole for good behaviour.

Anyone found guilty of carrying a firearm should receive a minimum sentence of 10 years without parole for good behaviour.

Anyone found guilty of murder (to kill intentionally and with premeditation) should receive a minimum sentence of 30 years without parole. 

Anyone found guilty of killing a police officer should receive a life sentence with no prospect of release.
